thread.section_title: HablaMexico.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HablaMexico.com | hablamexico.com
thread.title: Nicole J

author: Nicole J
title: Nicole J
text: I've been using Habla mexico for more than 5 years now and I don't plan on ever using anything else. Its so economical and simple to use. My 75 year old grandma uses it regularly and 5 dollars will last her a good 6 months (she averages 30 minute calls about 4-5 times a week. I know because Habla Mexico keeps track!) Pinless dialing is so convenient and you can even set up speed dial on your online account. I love love love love Habla Mexico! I can't imagine why anyone would use anything else :)
